extendedInfo.description: Widgeton makes you faster. This is a widget which helps you do your common activities in effective way.[Widget is also known as WIDGETON].It has 4 functions:1. add contact faster - write down name and number and save it with one click. If you want, you can simply continue to full featured native contact application2. create event easier - usually you need 3 things - "what where and when". Fill this out and continue by choosing your favorite calendar application.3. new SMS with one click - tap SMS button and new SMS form is shown immediately.4. write note comfortably - this tool allows you to write note with a simple form with easily resizable font according to your current needs.As it is a widget on your home screen, you can customize its look by changing color to match your homescreen.In case you have any suggestion feel free to send an email to widgeton@evolverie.com-----------------------------To mike's 1star review: Widget IS there. Name is "Widgeton", you have been probably looking for "Add Contact".-----------------------------Keywords: widget, widgeton, add contact, faster, easier, sms, note, quick widget, home screen, add contact

reviews.title: App does nothing.
reviews.comment: Installed on Android 4.1, and there\'s NO widget to be found.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb. Polished
reviews.comment: Efficiency is the name of the game. Does what It says. The prettiness of the widget is an unexpected freebie! I wish experimenting with background color was easier than removing widget and adding again. Note: for new android versions go to widgets tab in apps to add to home screen.
reviews.author: Erwin D\'Souza

reviews.title: Most efficient way to add a contact!
reviews.comment: Good job! I loved this app as the uncluttered UI makes it a breeze to add contacts thanks! Would love the possibility of the adding of an extra field (i.e.: email) in the quick save screen. I find myself often adding this info nowadays :)
reviews.author: Jonathan Sebastien A

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Its nice how this app doesn\'t try to take the place of other useful apps, but it does a very good job of complimenting these apps and makes things cleaner and easier. Very nice widget. However, being stuck with only the 4 options is tough. My only suggestion would be is to also have a single block widget that you can customize. That would push me to 5 stars.
reviews.author: Darren Galindo

reviews.title: Ah hah! I found the right one and I love it!
reviews.comment: So useful. I can just hand my phone to someone and ask them to add their own new contact information. And it auto-capitalizes the first letter of first and last name. I couldn\'t find another widget that did that...  Paul Hallett\'s Quick Add was a comparable runner up with a more integrated \"Text Back\" feature, and really cool looking single button \"Quick Add\" widget, but no auto caps and common looking UX\342\200\223so I couldn\'t give that one to a client to \'add\' into.  Great job Widgeton! Clean! Sophisticated look. And I happen to really need a quick event adder and an instant note app! So I\'m hooked now and I won\'t do without it! Will you tell me though, how do I activate the instant SMS feature?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to quickly add contacts but...
reviews.comment: Almost perfect but keyboard blocks access to quick add button. So need to long press menu to close keyboard and store info
reviews.author: Ray D\303\251Vries

reviews.title: Recomended
reviews.comment: A simple easy n quick n small working app....thanx a lot.. Plz plz add a transparent theme.
reviews.author: ashupurn choubey

reviews.title: Nice widget
reviews.comment: Works perfectly. Would be nice if there was a transparency option for the widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for :)
reviews.author: A Google User
